sub_fields.label: Use for Test?
sub_fields.name: use_for_test
sub_fields.instructions:
Enabling this will hide the element by default, a test (such as with Optimizely) will be able to show the element by targeting the `.show-split-test` class.

If disabled, element will show regardless.

sub_fields.label: Hide after
sub_fields.name: featured_logo_display
sub_fields.instructions: Hide logo after specified screen size

sub_fields.label: Plans
sub_fields.name: plans
sub_fields.instructions: Plan #2 will have the "Most Popular" heading and blue background

sub_fields.label: Promo Exclusion
sub_fields.name: promo_exclusion
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, this plan is not listed with promotional changes.

sub_fields.label: Monthly Plan - Monthly Cost
sub_fields.name: monthly_plan_cost
sub_fields.instructions: If a number is inserted, it will show as a dollar value per month. If text is inserted, it will appear as entered.

sub_fields.label: Promo Monthly Plan - Monthly Cost
sub_fields.name: promo_monthly_plan_cost
sub_fields.instructions: If a number is inserted, it will show as a dollar value per month. If text is inserted, it will appear as entered.

sub_fields.label: Yearly Plan - Monthly Cost
sub_fields.name: yearly_plan_cost
sub_fields.instructions: If a number is inserted, it will show as a dollar value per month. If text is inserted, it will appear as entered.

sub_fields.label: Promo Yearly Plan - Monthly Cost
sub_fields.name: promo_yearly_plan_cost
sub_fields.instructions: If a number is inserted, it will show as a dollar value per month. If text is inserted, it will appear as entered.
